TopicTitle: [Space Station]Which mods do I need to build...

Articles.Content:
large rotating space station rings ?

By that I mean rotating the habitat module only(e.g. to create 1g) and not the whole space station.

Magic Smoke Infernal Robotics ? others ? or a combo ?

I have seen a few pictures(gifs) here and still not sure where to get the rotating hub part ?

thanks for your patience ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Magic has a part just for that here [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/84566-WIP-Magic-Smoke-Industries-Station-Parts-%28Infernal-Robotics-required%29](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/84566-WIP-Magic-Smoke-Industries-Station-Parts-%28Infernal-Robotics-required%29) And there was also a Stock MODULE for that but think it was buggy [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/114295-1-02-Spin-o-Tron-Motors-%28FINALLY-UPDATED%29](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/114295-1-02-Spin-o-Tron-Motors-%28FINALLY-UPDATED%29)
There is this one for pre built habs. [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/64442-Habitat-Pack](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/64442-Habitat-Pack)

Not sure if these still work in 1.0.X.

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/84106-0-90-Stanford-Torus-0-6](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/84106-0-90-Stanford-Torus-0-6)https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/79542

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/79542](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/79542) (hab is part way down the page)
[Deep space exploration vessels](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/87070-WIP-0-24-Nuclear-Engines-0-1) also has a part that works the same as the Magic Smoke part...

Guys, those are all brill, thanks ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Unfortunately I seem to have problems(like all others) with the memory limit on 32 bit WIN 7 build of this wonderful game ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

I will rethink my approach and maybe start a new KSP with minimum stuff on it for my purposes.

(going to Linux is not an option for me currently, but I will ask my friend about it)

- - - Updated - - -

I will look in the correct forum here and see if I want to go for dual booting ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> Unfortunately I seem to have problems(like all others) with the memory limit on 32 bit WIN 7 build of this wonderful game ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

Why don't you go for open-gl? Saves lots of memory but for me it has killed anti-aliasing making everything look a bit crappy.
